alert.note: Alert for Collier (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 27 at 5:45PM EDT until September 27 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Collier County in southwestern Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 544 PM EDT, a tornado producing storm was located over Big Cypress National Preserve, or 20 miles northeast of Chokoloskee, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
